name: My Summer Internship
description:
An intern is put up to a task way out of their depth, where they have to save the moon from infestation. They must descend the caves of the moon to administer the shot!

Tips:

- Dash is a ground based move that makes you momentarily invulnerable

- You can dash an approaching Wasp

- Getting hit, and entering a room, also make you invulnerable. Use the time to reposition.

- Infected pools can be used as a mega jump, at the price of some health

- Collect the green orbs that appear from dead baddies to increase fire rate (in the HUD). Be careful as getting hit reduces it again.

Controls:

- Move: WASD

- Shoot: Left Mouse Click

- Shift: Ground Dodge

- Enter: Interactions

- Esc: Pause

There are currently some bugs in the game:

- Some enemies may be invisible

- During some level transitions you may get stuck in a wall

- You may randomly stop being able to shoot at some point in the game

- Items can spawn in the wall

Sorry about all of these!!
